#### Credits

Individualized Framingham Lung Function Decline Predictor is created by Amin Adibi, Wenjia Chen, Jane Krot, Ainsleigh Hill, and Mohsen Sadatsafavi at the University of British Columbia. 

Please cite this paper when using the results of this web application:

Chen, Wenjia et al. Individualized prediction of lung function decline and risk of COPD in the general adult population. To be submitted to JAMA.
